Mageflame.CHARACTERFLAGS.initiativeAdvHi: Human racial feat to roll 2d20 for initiative and keep the higher roll.
Mageflame.CHARACTERFLAGS.improvedIniativ: General feat to increase initiative by +4.

Mageflame.CHARACTERFLAGS.extraMagicItemH: Carry an extra Magic Item without becoming overwhelmed by Quirks
Mageflame.CHARACTERFLAGS.powerSpellHint: Choose a power / spell as if you were the next level
Mageflame.COINS.trinesHint: Beautiful Elven coins that meld gold, silver, and platinum. Usually worth 3 Standard Gold pieces.
Mageflame.COINS.towersHint: Standard Dwarven Gold pieces - square with grooved edges, they stack perfectly with themselves.
Mageflame.COINS.nupesHint: Standard Gold pieces from New Port
Mageflame.COINS.saintsHint: Standard Gold pieces from Santa Cora
